definition: a rack to hold meat for cooking over hot charcoal usually out of doors, to cook outdoors on a grill
details:
noun
- a rack to hold meat for cooking over hot charcoal usually out of doors
= synonyms: barbeque
- a cookout in which food is cooked over an open fire
= synonyms: barbeque
- meat that has been barbecued or grilled in a highly seasoned sauce
= synonyms: barbeque
verb
- to cook outdoors on a grill
= example: to cook outdoors on a grill
= synonyms: barbeque, cook out
